Vulnerability.Description: - [3.10.0-693.1.1.OL7] - Oracle Linux certificates (Alexey Petrenko) - Oracle Linux RHCK Module Signing Key was compiled into kernel (olkmod_signing_key.x509)(alexey.petrenko@oracle.com) - Update x509.genkey [bug 24817676] [3.10.0-693.1.1] - [fs] dentry name snapshots (Miklos Szeredi) [1471131 1470403] {CVE-2017-7533} - [fs] fix the regression from 'direct-io: Fix negative return from dio read beyond eof' (Eric Sandeen) [1475669 1473549] - [fs] direct-io: Fix negative return from dio read beyond eof (Eric Sandeen) [1475669 1473549]
Vulnerability.Name: ELSA-2017-2473

Vulnerability.Description: [0.12.8-2.1] - Redo build properly versioned as a zstream build   Related: CVE-2017-7506 [0.12.8-3] - Prevent potential buffer/integer overflows with invalid MonitorsConfig messages   sent from an authenticated client   Resolves: CVE-2017-7506
Vulnerability.Name: ELSA-2017-2471
